sometimes i wish my computer would work faster.

content.text: Hi I'm from New Hampshire and a fruitarian
Hello! I'm from the Midwest, where meat and potatoes are king. What are some of your favorite fruits?
I love mangos, dragon fruit, and persimmons! What about you?
I love all fruits! But my favorites are probably strawberries and blueberries.
Those are great choices! I love how sweet and juicy they are.
Yes, they're perfect for a quick snack. Do you have any pets?
I do! I have a cat named Leela.
Aww, cats are the best! What kind of cat is she?
I know, right? She's the sweetest cat.
I'm sure she is! Cats are such loving creatures.
Yes, they are. I'm so glad I have her.
Me too! I'm sure you're a great pet owner
